strapiPost.title: Sting To Perform At Walmart AMP This October
strapiPost.content:
The Walmart AMP has a stellar lineup for the 2023 Concert Series and recently announced the addition of The All-American Rejects, performing Oct 10, and rock legend Sting, performing Oct 12.

  • On stage: The 2023 Season kicks off Apr 21 with Walker Hayes, followed by some exciting shows throughout the summer and into the fall, such as Dave Mathews Band, Snoop Dogg, and Jason Aldean.
  • New features: The AMP will feature several new add-ons this season, including the AMP Underground, an all-ages club located under the Choctaw Plaza with a private bar, food menu, live video of ongoing shows, and priority venue entry.

The All-American Rejects and Sting tickets go on sale tomorrow, Apr 14, HERE.
